title: Platinum 3 Jungle Main LFT
body:
Currently I am in Plat 3, in promotions to Plat 2. I was Gold 2 at the end of season 4, was place in Gold 2 and I have been climbing since then. As stated in the title, I am a jungle main, however I can play all roles if needed.

I am comfortable on nearly all jungle champions. Currently, my go-to junglers include {{champion:113}} , {{champion:254}} , {{champion:54}} , {{champion:106}} , {{champion:76}} , {{champion:59}} and {{champion:64}} .

I have access to Skype and TeamSpeak, and if needed I can get another form of communication. I am 16 years old, and I can play 2-3 hours on a weekday and 5-6 hours on a weekend. I am very positive in game and I am always willing to learn. The team I am looking for would be one that is serious when it comes down to it, but can have a good time as well.

If interested, my IGN is **Satanic Chicken**. Feel free to add me if you wish to discuss details.

Edit: Won promotion series to Plat 2

replies.body:
Hey, if you would be interested in creating a team here is a link to my post:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/smxWnEHv-gold-1-junglertopmid-lft

Let me know what you think.

I am currently still patching so can't add your ign yet :)
Sounds good. I have sent you a friend request so when you are able to get on let me know.
